execution_quality: The agent executed the commit efficiently but provided minimal context about what was committed. Two bash calls completed the requested action within 15 seconds without errors.
work_category: Git commit execution with protocol file changes. The user asked to commit a protocol change, and the agent ran git commands to stage and commit the work.
summary: Agent successfully executed the commit request with appropriate autonomy and minimal friction. The immediate transition to a new task indicates user satisfaction with the prior work. Communication was adequate though sparse—the agent completed what was asked without over-explanation or unnecessary additions.
follow_up_pattern: User immediately requested a new task (writing spec documentation), suggesting satisfaction with the commit and moving forward with the next step in the workflow.
